Class ScoreBoard

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      ScoreBoard

public class ScoreBoard
extends greenfoot.Actor

A ScoreBoard is a "banner" for the fiishing game that displays: * the amount of time left in the game * the current game's score * the highest score for any game since the program was started NOTE: You should not need to mdify this code in any way. Although you are certainly welcome to modify it, doing so is likely to make this project millions of times harder than it should be. All you need to do is look the public interface documentation for this class!

Version:
8/2018
Author:
Stephen Blythe
